channel.title: Pay with Paypal?
channel.description: How can i send money without Paypal asking me to provide my credit card details? I've already put some money on it with my Bank account so isn't that enough for a verification?

item.title: Pay with Paypal?
item.dc:creator: @Ske Ske
item.description:
@Ske wrote:

And how would i do that?

“Once you have reached your sending limit with your PayPal account, you must become Verified to continue sending money with our service”
I haven’t sent anything so why would they require me to become verified?

I’ve already sent about €10 from my bank account to paypal and it’s for a domain and hosting services, but they still want me to get verified?

Read full topic
